trans-unit.source: The BuildStatusEventArgs class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> status event argument classes.
trans-unit.target: BuildStatusEventArgs 类是所有的抽象基类<xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>状态事件自变量类。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildStatusEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Message*>, <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.HelpKeyword*>, and <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.SenderName*> values.

trans-unit.source: The Help keyword associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 与事件关联的帮助关键字。
